Name: wmo_wis2_gb_messages_no_metadata_total
Description: Number of messages received without corresponding metadata from centre

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_messages_invalid_topic_total
Description: Number of messages received on an invalid topic from centre

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_messages_invalid_format_total
Description: Number of invalid messages from centre

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_messages_published_total
Description: Number of messages published by broker

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_messages_received_total
Description: Number of messages received by broker

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_connected_flag
Description: Connection status from broker to centre

Name: wmo_wis2_gb_last_message_timestamp_seconds
Description: Timestamp of last message received from centre
